langdetect

Class Profile

  • java.lang.Object
    • langdetect.Profile

  • public class Profile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a frequency profile of a text. In the initial state, n-grams of a text can be added and their numbers of occurrence will be determined. Once the profile is finalized, the added n-grams are sorted in reverse order of frequency and its position is stored in each n-gram.
    Author:
    Tobias Falke

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the profile's name.
        Returns:
        Name

      • addNGram

        public int addNGram(java.lang.String ngram)
             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Adds an n-gram to the profile. If the n-gram is already present, its counter is incremented. If not, it is added to the set of n-grams with a count of 1. The new number of occurrences of the n-gram is returned.
        Parameters:
        ngram - n-gram
        Returns:
        New number of occurrences
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the profile is already finalized

      • finalize

        public void finalize()
        Finalizes the profile. The added n-grams with their current count are used to calculate the reverse-order frequency profile. The sort-order is now available, but all n-grams after the cut-off position are lost and no additional n-grams can be added.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object

      • isFinalized

        public boolean isFinalized()
        Returns the current state of the profile.
        Returns:
        true, if already finalized, false otherwise

      • getOutOfPlaceMeasure

        public int getOutOfPlaceMeasure(Profile oP)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Calculates the out-of-place measure for this and another profile.
        Parameters:
        oP - other profile
        Returns:
        out-of-place measure
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if one of the profiles is not yet finalized

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a textual representation of the profile.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Text
